"""
draw_rectangle(x, y, width, height; linecolor=:black, fillcolor=:white)

Draws a rectangle using `Plots.jl` at position `(x,y)` with given `width` and `height`.
Accepts optional `linecolor` and `fillcolor` arguments to customize the appearance.

# Arguments
- `x::Real`: X-coordinate of the

Examples
```julia
julia> draw_rectangle(0, 0, 1, 2, linecolor=:red, fillcolor=:green)
```
"""
function draw_rectangle(x, y, width, height; linecolor=:black, fillcolor=:white)
    plot!([x,x+width,x+width,x,x], [y,y,y+height,y+height,y], linecolor=linecolor, fill=true, fillcolor=fillcolor)
end
